usage.cn: 这次出差我要拜访几位重要客户。
usage.eng: On this trip I have to visit several important customers.

usage.cn: 我们相信能在数量上更好地使客户满意。
usage.eng: We believe we shall be able to better satisfy our customers quantitatively.

usage.cn: 许多人在商业中过于看重外部条件, 比如办公条件, 而忽视了真正重要的东西: 如何获取客户，以及怎样赚钱——《rework》
usage.eng: In business, too many people obsess over external conditions instead of what really matters. And what really matters is how to actually get customers and make money.
